Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties of the various controls against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: Property of <font face="courier new">TextBox</font> control used to allow the user to enter text on multiple lines.
Property of <font face="courier new">MaskedTextBox</font> control used to denote missed input.
Property of <font face="courier new">ComboBox</font> control used to indicate the number of items in the list.
Property of the <font face="courier new">ListBox</font> control used to get or set the selected item.
Property of the <font face="courier new">Button</font> control used to specify the image.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(3), (B)-(1), (C)-(4), (D)-(5), and (E)-(2).
